item.title: 2024-11-04-01-04-59-Work-Desk-additions
item.description:
# Work: Desk additions
![Desk with hanging box for mixer and hinged box for cords.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-07-25-2000.jpg)
Three small additions to the desk today. Trying to tidy up based on where things have accumulated.
![Open desk box with USB hubs.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-08-27-2000.jpg)
![Experimenting more with magnets, the door has one stuck to its back that then sticks to a screw.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-08-07-2000.jpg)
![Closed door hinge box, a little crooked, the cracks are how the coords get out.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-17-28-2000.jpg)
![Recessed ledge for USB hub and phone charger, will probably enclose some of this.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-07-37-2000.jpg)
![The sheet with the morning's rough plans - pretty much directly follow through, except the magnet was an in the moment thing.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-20-08-35-2000.jpg)

item.title: 2024-11-03-12-40-41-Work-Basement-project-table
item.description:
# Work: Basement project table
![Basement project table with sewing machine and marked off project section](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-07-51-41-2000.jpg)
I feel like these quick builds are an exercise in building intuition about "how wood goes together". And then using it is building intuition about "what makes a table feel good to use", that then feeds into the next build.
## Process
Built out of 3/4" plywood and 2x6s (because I'm out of 2x4s). Nice to be at a stage where I can do this in a couple of hours. A bit wobbly either because of cuts or more likely the floor. But anchoring to the wall solved that. Left a reminder (mostly to myself) to keep it clear.
![2x6s cut](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-07-40-55-800.jpg)
![All the pieces](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-07-41-11-800.jpg)
![Assembling, with couch for support](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-07-41-31-800.jpg)
![Mostly finished, but without the brace](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-03-07-41-42-800.jpg)

item.title: 2024-11-01-18-48-07-Work-Bin-wall
item.description:
# Work: Bin wall
![Left wall I've my office, now filled with shoebox-sized bins.](https://grant-uploader.s3.amazonaws.com/2024-11-01-14-49-38-2000.jpg)
I've gone all in on clear shoebox + masking tape storage. Great for locating cords and small electronics so far. Still more to be figured out in terms of overall sorting (I'm hoping a natural cache will emerge?).
